name: Glorious Zagorgkzkiy Test Facility No.37
description:
I have been taken prisoner by the Zagorgkzkiy republic

They intend to use my knowledge of robotics to test their newest spy robot. 

If I succeed, maybe they will let me go.

One thing is for certain, Zagorgkzkiy make crappy robots.

------------------------------------------------------------------

"keep falling over haha" - Anonymous

"Leans into its jank. Simple yet fun with a good quirk in game play" - Anonymous

"Glorious Zagorgkzkiy will rise once more all who oppose will be shot" - Anonymous

Made in 48hours for the GMTK Jam Theme "Out Of Control"

Assets created in Blender

Sounds from https://freesound.org/ & https://opengameart.org/ - Majority created in Audacity
